controller

Class PeriCATController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PeriCATController

  • public class PeriCATController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller controls the whole interaction of the framework components. It lists datasets and algorithms, asks the DistanceCalculator which algorithm is the best to use for the given Scenario and technical constraints (file numbers, file sizes, etc.). At least the controller calls the Encapsulator with carrier, payload and algorithm, to start the encapsulation process, and the Decapsulator to start restoring processes. The controller also manages the user interfaces (GUI) and forwards their events to the proper classes.
